---
title: "Making A Reproducible RMarkdown File"
author: "Marian L. Schmidt"
date: "August 23, 2015"
output: html_document
---

Today, I learned about reproducibility.  The first thing I should do, is set my seed.

```{r Set Seed, eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
#runif(1, 0, 1^8)
set.seed(seed = 43855096)
```

```{r install packages, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
#install.packages("devtools")
library("devtools")
#install.packages("ggplot2")
library("ggplot2")
```

Always remember to included session info for reproducibility!

```{r session_info, include=TRUE, echo=TRUE, results='markup'}
devtools::session_info()
```
